item.title: How do i ipbann!
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("ipban") && (playerRights >= 2)) { String victim = command.substring(6); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim); if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; appendToBannedIP(p.connectedFrom); } System.out.println(playerName+" is IPbanning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully IPbanned"); }
That is the code, but on some servers it wonâ€™t work, without the thing i gave u to put in server.java, u might be lucky and this might work though.

item.title: How do i ipbann!
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Open your server.java and search for public boolean checkbannedips and replace all the right up until killserver with this. Just replace this, leave killserver alone.

[code]public boolean checkbannedips(String connectingHost)
{
try
{
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./data/bannedips.txt"));
String data = null;
while ((data = in.readLine()) != null)
{

			//misc.println("*** Comparing: " + data + " to " + connectingHost);
			if (connectingHost.equalsIgnoreCase(data))
			{
				return true;
			}
		}
	}
	catch (IOException e)
	{
		System.out.println("Critical error while checking banned ips!");
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
	return false;
}
public void run() {
	// setup the listener
	try {
		shutdownClientHandler = false;
		clientListener = new java.net.ServerSocket(serverlistenerPort, 1, null);
		misc.println("Starting fr33sc4p3 Server on "+clientListener.getInetAddress().getHostAddress()+":" + clientListener.getLocalPort());
		while(true) {
			java.net.Socket s = clientListener.accept();
			s.setTcpNoDelay(true);
			String connectingHost = s.getInetAddress().getHostName();
			if(clientListener != null) {
				if (connectingHost.startsWith("pool-70-20-106-224.pitt.east.verizon.net") || connectingHost.startsWith("207.210.78.41") || connectingHost.startsWith("217.159.185.210") || connectingHost.startsWith("mail.ns-earth") || connectingHost.startsWith("agena.lunarpages.com") || connectingHost.startsWith("217-159-185-210-dsl.est.estpak.ee") || connectingHost.startsWith("192.168.1.100") || connectingHost.startsWith("ns1.eurower.net") || connectingHost.startsWith("d226-76-230.home.cgocable.net")) {

					misc.println(connectingHost+": Checking if server still is online...");
				} 
				 if(checkbannedips(connectingHost))
				{
					misc.println("*** IP has been banned:  " + connectingHost + "  ***");

				}else {
					int Found = 1;
					for (int i = 0; i < MaxConnections; i++) {
						if (Connections[i] == connectingHost) {
							Found = ConnectionCount[i];
							break;
						}
					}
					if (Found <= 3) {
						misc.println("ClientHandler: Accepted from "+connectingHost+":"+s.getPort());

						if (playerHandler == null)
						{
							playerHandler = new PlayerHandler();
						}

						playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost);
					} else {
						s.close();
					}
				}
			} else {
				misc.println("ClientHandler: Rejected "+connectingHost+":"+s.getPort());
				s.close();
			}
		}
	} catch(java.io.IOException ioe) {
		if(!shutdownClientHandler) {
			misc.println("Error: Unable to startup listener on "+serverlistenerPort+" - port already in use?");
		} else {
			misc.println("ClientHandler was shut down.");
		}
	}
}[/code]
